com.meat

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meat.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The player. Every level needs one.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnLoc,
              float acceleration,
              com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
              boolean isPlayerOne)
        Parameters:
        spawnLoc - The location the player spawns in the game.
        acceleration - How fast the player accelerates.
        world - the box2d world used in the current level
        isPlayerOne - whether the player is player one (not used)

      • roundPixmap

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Pixmap roundPixmap(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Pixmap pixmap,
                                                           int xOff,
                                                           int yOff,
                                                           int radius)
        Takes a square Pixmap and cuts a circle out of it in a given radius
        Parameters:
        pixmap - The Pixmap to be cut
        xOff - the x-offset of the circle cut
        yOff - the y-offset of the circle cut
        radius - the radius of the circle cut
        Returns:
        A Pixmap cutout of the given definitions.

        Parameters:

      • isCellBlocked

        public int isCellBlocked(MeatGame meatGame,
                         float x,
                         float y)
        Checks for collision with holes and goals at a given coordinate
        Parameters:
        meatGame - the running MeatGame instance
        x - the x position to be checked
        y - the y position to be checked
        Returns:
        GOAL if Player is over a goal, HOLE if Player is over a hole, else 0
